tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landfill_closure_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_date DATE,
  responsible_party VARCHAR(100),
  monitoring_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE LandfillSites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255),
  site_location VARCHAR(255),
  closure_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MonitoringActivities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  activity_date DATE,
  activity_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RemediationPlans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_status VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PostClosureReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalMonitoringData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  monitoring_date DATE,
  parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
  parameter_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
  measurement_unit VARCHAR(50)
)
